trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZA006_03348_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The astute artisan is openly staring.

TEXT_LUCKZA006_03348_CRAFTSMAN03348_000_000<tab>Pardon me for staring─I couldn't help but notice that you have the posture of one who has trained in martial techniques. Might I beg your assistance with a small matter?

TEXT_LUCKZA006_03348_CRAFTSMAN03348_000_001<tab>A friend of mine has recently joined the guard, you see. I was hoping to put my skills to work in crafting her armor more durable than the standard-issue fare, but she's already been stationed out in Lakeland.

TEXT_LUCKZA006_03348_CRAFTSMAN03348_000_002<tab>I have her measurements, of course, but I find myself unsure of which parts of the garment will need to be reinforced, and which will need to hang a bit loose for mobility's sake. Would you be willing to demonstrate a few common stances for me?

TEXT_LUCKZA006_03348_CRAFTSMAN03348_000_003<tab>Thank you! In that case, could you begin by showing me your usual <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>battle stance<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>?
TEXT_LUCKZA006_03348_CRAFTSMAN03348_000_004<tab>You needn't be self-conscious─just move how you usually do.

TEXT_LUCKZA006_03348_CRAFTSMAN03348_000_010<tab>Hmm... I may need to add a bit more give around the shoulders. Would you mind throwing a few punches as well? As if you were <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>boxing<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_LUCKZA006_03348_CRAFTSMAN03348_000_011<tab>This perhaps goes without saying, but you needn't actually hit anyone. I only wish to see how you move when you throw a punch.
TEXT_LUCKZA006_03348_CRAFTSMAN03348_000_020<tab>I see─the entire torso needs to be able to twist. And the knuckle portion of the gloves could likely use a bit more padding...
TEXT_LUCKZA006_03348_CRAFTSMAN03348_000_021<tab>I believe I understand what alterations to make. You've been a great help─thank you.

TEXT_LUCKZA006_03348_CRAFTSMAN03348_000_022<tab>I must say that what you're wearing seems quite finely made, but if ever you do find yourself in need of new equipment, come and find me. I would be happy to offer you a reduced rate on my custom work!
